ai-tha-ap57:1.4_0: and went to my own house.
ai-tha-ap57:2.1_0: “Not in the world with its gods,
ai-tha-ap57:2.2_0: the Teacher, a disciple of the Teacher,
ai-tha-ap57:4.1_0: When you’ve vanquished the best of fire,
ai-tha-ap57:6.2_0: and those who associate with him.
ai-tha-ap57:6.3_0: Then I’ll pay homage to her again,
ai-tha-ap57:6.4_0: If the Buddhas in the world,
ai-tha-ap57:7.3_0: looks all around the four directions,
ai-tha-ap57:8.1_0: This is the last time for me;
ai-tha-ap57:8.4_0: having left victory and defeat behind.
ai-tha-ap57:10.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap57:11.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vaḍḍha.
ai-tha-ap57:12.1_0: the fifth senior monk who was a middle, and the fifth.
